imdb.plot outline: Lydia Worthington persuades her soon to be ex husband, Kenneth Thompson to call off the divorce and start over. Beatrice Montgomery is very suspicious of her husband, Montell Richards, always being "on call" and never seems to spend time with her. Nadia Langdon, sister to Lydia, thinks she finally found their long lost mother but Lydia is not interested in reuniting with her. Kenneth is actually one step ahead of Lydia and has brought her ex husband, Xavier Bentley to Rushmore to confront her. Find out how all of these people's lives are intertwined when you watch "When The Mirror Breaks" the new YouTube Soap Opera/Drama #wtmb.
